properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

authors.author: St. Theresa wa Mtoto Yesu, Mwanza

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Ee Bwana pokea vipaji vyetu,
Ee Bwana pokea vipaji vyetu
tunavileta mbele
ya mezayo takatifu. x2
(Ee Baba) uvibariki
(na pia) uvitakase.
Tunakuomba Bwana
Mungu upokee.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Ni mazao ya mashamba -
Bwana Mungu upokee.
Kazi ya mikono yetu -
Bwana Mungu upokee.
Twakuomba upokee -
Bwana Mungu upokee.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Tunaleta nyoyo zetu -
Bwana Mungu upokee.
Nazo ugeuze Baba -
Bwana Mungu upokee.
Tuwe wako maishani -
Bwana Mungu upokee.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Tubariki wana wako -
Bwana Mungu upokee.
Tufanikiwe daim -
Bwana Mungu upokee.
Katika shughuli zetu -
Bwana Mungu upokee.
